lenders.occupational_info: I am a former model...I recently had my first child, and I now stay home to be with him.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people help themselves. I'm not opposed to giving someone money, but usually that enables their dependance on others. Loaning means they are somewhat self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info:
I teach band music and a general music class to kids that are 10-13 years old. In band we play instruments (trumpet, flute, snare drum, etc.) and play concerts for people. The students learn to read music.

General music is a lecture type class. We spend a lot of time talking about music and listening to music.

lenders.name: James

lenders.name: Joseph

lenders.occupational_info: I work.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is good to help people who are willing to work for profit and be responsible with their earnings.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor that gives medicines to patients so they remain asleep during surgery.

lenders.loan_because: "Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today.  Teach a man to fish; and you feed him for a lifetime"
lenders.occupational_info:
I love technology.  It is my avocation!
I work to make it so everyone can benefit from it.  Communication is critical to understanding, and through understanding we can come to appreciate everyone and everything.

I joined and started to loan to KIVA while unemployed.  It has payed back to me over and over and over again.

lenders.occupational_info: I live on a ship, doing odd jobs for maintenance, mostly oriented around the navigation radar systems.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful that I have everything I need and I want to share my good fortune

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Christ has given freely to us and I want to share his love and provision to those who are in need.

lenders.name: Priscilla

lenders.name: Mattia
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and I should.  I have been raised in the most prosperous land on Earth, and I know there are lots of things most people take for granted on a daily basis here in the USA that many people in the world at large do not have and have not experienced.  I want to see this great divide shrink to nothingness, and for everyone on this planet to have access to what they need to live a happy, healthy life.
lenders.occupational_info: I promote and market everything from music to small businesses.  If you are an entrepreneur and need some help in this area, holler at me!  I will do pro bono work for a good cause!

lenders.occupational_info: I sell jewelry.

lenders.name: Yasser

lenders.name: Percy

lenders.loan_because: I loan because there is a need to loan. I believe if you never give a person a chance to show you what they can do then you are denying them the right to individuality.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a number of company's who hire me to go out on location and help make a television show possible.

lenders.name: Ville
lenders.loan_because: Well, frankly because it makes me feel good. This is an easy way to help out people around the world.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: the children of a struggling  household suffer the most. If I can contribute to the progression of the head of household then the whole family benefits!

lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in life.  I love helping others, and there are few ways that one can directly assist the course of life for so many individuals with such ease.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently seeking a Masters of Divinity degree prior to ordination within my church to work as a minister.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: We all need help sometimes.

lenders.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of humanity.

lenders.occupational_info: I write software for mobile phones.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because: I know God appreciates those who share what He has given them.  I don't want to be a goat. Read Matthew 25: 31-46

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need that are motivated to help themselves and their families attain a better quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and raise my two children.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born in a developed nation and with no serious disability, fully capable of "success" by typical standards.  I can't not take the opportunity to share what I've been given.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I go to school for business and education.

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: How could I not, when it takes so little to give so much? :)

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because:
"I am of the opinion that my life belongs to the community, and as long as I live it is my privilege to do for it whatever I can." 
--Shaw
lenders.occupational_info: I work to bring the world together instead of dividing it.  Community is global.

lenders.name: Korhan
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a change in peoples' lives. I don't earn much at all, but I believe if you touch someone with a golden hand, someone else will touch you too...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a university student doing research...

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I will loan to Field Partners  who's lending rates are lowest. Right now I do not feel that my money really needs to help MFI's if the borrower is forced to pay 20 -30 % (credit card rates) inflation is low here in the US so the rate I lend at should remain low if my money truly is to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Internet Domain registration and web hosting  completly free to non profits. Contact to get ad free web hosting for your non profit. Also fundraising sites with InstaPayment

lenders.name: Elliott
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I think that everyone deserves an opportunity to get the money that they need to support their family and this is a great way to help people get things that they need to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because:
Proverbs 19:17 (New International Version):
" 17 He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done."

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: In life, its not what you know, it is who you know..... and that is not fair.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all deserve a chance. I was lucky I was given many—I hope I can make a difference in someone's else life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a designer and an illustrator. I love to create!

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I am a capitalist
lenders.occupational_info: vitamin manufacturing

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I am a Social Venture Entrepreneur, and I understand how badly microlending is needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I start businesses that return a profit, that also contribute to the betterment of society.

lenders.name: Dave C.
lenders.loan_because: We're all connected. I know that I'm fortunate to have the opportunities that I have. I want to help others create opportunities, and I don't think you need to change the whole world to make a difference. In fact, it's the other way 'round.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize groups of people to create online video games: games that are played on computers with thousands of other people around the world over the internet. I make sure the team has what they need: computers & software (the tools they use to do the work), a vision for the game (what we want to make), and a business plan to make sure that it's something that people will actually want to pay for and play and enjoy. I then I set up a system to track our work as it progresses toward our goal: a finished game. I then measure our progress scientifically so that we can fix things that are broken, as well as make changes to constantly improve how we achieve our goals.

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I want to engage my moral responsiblity to be part of the global community. I believe that it is a responsibility to engage in the social challenges that we all face.
lenders.occupational_info: I study International Relations , Human Rights and Evironmental Sustainability Studies. I am not sure what I want to do when I graduate but I hope it contibutes to the spread of human dignity in some way.

lenders.name: Devin and Marilee
lenders.loan_because: I know that by letting someone borrow it allows them to live a better life, and it helps me live a more meaningful life.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school to learn and prepare for my future.

lenders.name: Renate
lenders.loan_because: I believe in microfinance.

lenders.name: Tibor R Dani Jr
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurs are unsung heroes, who pursue their dreams with unrelenting passion and audacity.  Their incessant struggle rewards the world with progress and innovation.  It is an honor to help them on their journey.

lenders.name: Daneil
lenders.loan_because: It provides an opportunity for others to lift themslevs out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage small survey projects.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: because these people need our help.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: We need to make the world better and this goes a long way towards that goal. Economic independence for individuals will go a long way towards peace for all.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to reach out and make a difference, hand to hand, face to face.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children that can't talk or have trouble talking to speak.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It's my way of planting seed for my own businesses.  It's also a neat way to loan money to help others become or stay entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in real estate and help others to do the same.

lenders.name: The Chang Family
lenders.loan_because: Our family believes in giving back and in a small way help eliminate poverty.  Through our loans we wish that hard working people will have a chance to start a business and be to grow it.  Our focus is the Philippines.

lenders.name: don
lenders.loan_because: if we all lend some money that we have " left over"  we can make somebody on the otherside of the world happy with it. And it makes me happy to help somebody start or build up his company.
lenders.occupational_info: i'm working for the city of rotterdam and designing the outside of the city; streets,parks,squares and the qay's of the river.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: even in hard economic times, I realize that I have so much more that most of the world's population.

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: my daughter told me about Kiva, and it sounds like an interesting concept.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach those that plan to teach kids.

lenders.name: Eddie
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to make technology easier to understand.

lenders.name: Kiera
lenders.loan_because:
1) I believe in sharing some of what I have to benefit others. Even though this is true, it sounds unfortunately standard, so I'm going to also include an answer that is ridiculously un-true, but unexpected.  
2) By loaning I justify my large collection of porcelain models of Peruvian waterfowl.
lenders.occupational_info: A large dollop of linoleum.

lenders.name: Debbie, Max and Will
lenders.loan_because: We are very fortunate to have enough to make a living and improve our lives and would like to help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with families who teach their children and represent technology companies that are trying to create new businesses.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people overcome whatever obstacles they come across and succeed in achieving their goals.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help people that needed it so that they can buy food and things they need.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I too want to begin a nonprofit organization. My dream is to open an orphanage in China and one day make a lasting impact on them and the poor.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find books to read and I lend them to them. I also help my boss with paper work and keep the library open and running every day.

lenders.name: maria carlota
lenders.whereabouts: Ciudad de Buenos Aires Buenos Aires

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I figured that if it captured the interest of my amazing grandad, it must be a worthwhile cause...and it certainly is!

lenders.name: Laurie & Burt
lenders.loan_because: We feel we need to help other people when we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Burt works with his company's computer network, keeping everyone's computers running.  Laurie works with people who are mentally ill, helping them manage their money, housing, and health care.

lenders.name: Alessandra
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help other people who are trying to work hard to make their dreams come true.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Having lived overseas I know what a difference a loan with a reasonable interest rate can make.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently in my final year of study at the University of Chicago in Chicago, IL. I am pursuing a degree in International Studies with a focus on China.

lenders.name: Eli
lenders.loan_because: The world needs it.

lenders.name: Mihir
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: blessings are supposed to be shared
lenders.occupational_info: I am an activist for peace, between people, between governments, and with our earth.

lenders.name: Candy & Ralph
lenders.loan_because: We have many blessings and would like to share. By lending through Kiva, maybe we can help other people have better lives. We also believe in the Jewish teaching of Tikkun Olam, that we should each help repair the world.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: i makes me feel better and it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: i go to a public school.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people around the world deserve the chance to do great things in their lives.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: My life is very blessed and I want to spread some love around the planet. Thank you Kiva for bringing us all together the way you do.
lenders.occupational_info: I trim horses hooves.

lenders.name: biggie
lenders.loan_because: To support the dreams of those who don't have the resources. It would be ideal if everyone would be able to pursue their dreams.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I would just spend it on tshirts and marginally useful gadgets

lenders.name: VIKRAM
lenders.loan_because: Even a small amount can make a big difference.

lenders.name: Mr. Edwards
lenders.loan_because: Besides the incredible opportunity to help those help themselves, it is much more exciting teaching students real world lessons rather than those found in a textbook!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school to students aged 15-18

lenders.name: EddieStarr
lenders.loan_because: I Love
lenders.occupational_info:
I work full time, I attend University full time. I am by no means wealthy, though I feel very blessed and honored to be able to share what little extra income I have, to positivly impact another human's life.  

(Can I have a hug?)

lenders.name: Alicja
lenders.loan_because: I want woman to be independent.
lenders.occupational_info: System Engineer

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: We are all brothers and sisters on mother earth and there is no better purpose to life than helping others.

lenders.name: Kallie
lenders.loan_because: I think it is the most effective way of making the world a better place. Charity doesn't work. I'd much rather be part of a hand up, than a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am a Staff accountant working towards getting my chartered accountant designation.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: you matter to me (and thousands of others just like me).

lenders.name: Saadat
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: good

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do and the best way to do it is through micro loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm learning everything that goes into maintaining and growing a city.  I will take graduate classes on everything from basic civil engineering, history, politics and economics.

lenders.name: ross
lenders.loan_because: It warms my heart
lenders.occupational_info: traveller

lenders.name: Jepa
lenders.loan_because: For us the sums are quite small, but they can make someone more independent & proud of their work. Good ideas should not be dumped because of lack of money! I also work as a small enterpreneur, selling just my work, so I know something about financial worries.
lenders.occupational_info:
I do massage therapy to help people feel good in their bodies, to alleviate pain.

I also translate books from english to my mother tongue and edit books other people have translated. Because of my work my native language sounds beautiful and is easily understood.
